attributes.action: Stop the Ultra low emission zone in London affecting motorcycles.
attributes.additional_details: Sadiq Khan wants to bring this forward.
attributes.background: ULEZ is unfair normal people can't afford £12.50 per day + Congestion charge when only option is to buy a new car or bike from 2007.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
